relics.name: Ancient Meteorite
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 2.
At the start of your turn, lose [E][E] and draw cards until your hand is full.
relics.flavorText: Food for a giant green dragon, not for you!

relics.name: Cheese Board
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 1 Potion Slot.
All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones.
Potions are 40% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least 1.
Potions grant 1 Max HP on use.
relics.flavorText: Includes a wine glass to put a potion in! The meal complements your potions perfectly.

relics.name: Curse of the Peglin King
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare.
Upon pickup, gain 1 Potion Slot.
At the start of your turn, add a Miracle to the top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Half of the time you feel full of energy, half of the time you feel slow. This odd artifact also has a slot in the back for a night cap.

relics.name: Defresh Potion
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 1.
At the start of your turn, gain [E][E] and draw 2 cards.
ALL CARDS EXHAUST.
relics.flavorText: As you drink from the potion you feel your memory begin to fade... It never returns...

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Rare
keywords.description: Spawns less often than other Relics of its type.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

mods.name: Bundle Of Bundles
mods.description: Contains all of the config options and compatibility support for bundles.
